title: This is a tad Unfair
body: Riot i have recently been permanently  banned for flaming and being toxic towards other players. i know this may sound a bit cheese but those msgs are not mine i have let multiple friends use my account so they can try out new champs they don't own and since i have been banned one of which has apologized and admitted to it i am hoping u can UN ban this account because i have spent countless amounts of money and i am quite upset with this friend. i will promise to change the password so that these friends can not use it. I swear none of these chat msgs are from me because i have not been able to get to a computer in the last 3 months since my old computer broke and i was given this computer for an early Christmas present. Please Respond

replies.body:
These are the chat logs that got me banned if it helps in any way

ToeFeetish: lvl 3 gank me bro

Compared to some of the shit i have seen in ranked this i barely even toxic.

yeah even if it was toxic its so unfair that i got the ban when it wasn't even me being toxic. i mean its not unfair i was the stupid one to let him use it considering i've seen him flame before and he just go's ham on them for nothing.
Best advice for solo cue. -Mute all,

> [{quoted}](name=FerrousOxide,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=Mcl6wm67,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-24T06:23:44.814+0000)
>
> Best advice for solo cue. -Mute all,

yeah man thats what i do as soon as someone disagrees with someone else on our team and things start to get heated i just /mute all. and play my game and try not to worry about what my team mates are fighting about.

Oh and how do i send a ticket to riot
or what ever u meant?

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us
Click submit a request on the top on the screen

> [{quoted}](name=SirBlueWaffle,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=Mcl6wm67,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-12-24T06:35:07.249+0000)
>
> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us
> Click submit a request on the top on the screen

okay ty and what request type should i put it under?

Put it under general questions. 

Although I would also like to reiterate what others have said, it is unlikely your punishment will be revoked as you shared your account and broke one of the terms of use.
LOL account sharing is also a bannable offence friend. You won't be getting it back

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=Mcl6wm67,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-12-24T06:42:24.779+0000)
>
> LOL account sharing is also a bannable offence friend. You won't be getting it back

really that seems abit unfair like it is my account should i be able to do what i want with it

> [{quoted}](name=ToeFeetish,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=Mcl6wm67,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-12-24T06:44:26.491+0000)
>
> really that seems abit unfair like it is my account should i be able to do what i want with it

Actually no, It's not your account. Riot own the game, therefore they own everyone who plays LoL's accounts. Your account was toxic, your account gets banned.
Why do you think that this should be another way? If Riot unbanned your account; your friends would STILL use it and STILL be toxic.

Read the terms and conditions. its literally like the 4th rule - no sharing.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/legal/termsofuse#your-account

Assuming Riot's rules on account sharing are similar to Valve's then you are responsible for the behaviour of others on your account. Also you can't get perma banned unless you go through 2 chat restrictions and a 2 week suspension so either your mates went through these over the last 3 months (which if they did, they  are massive %%%%s) or you were already on thin ice before you lent them the account. You can try sending a ticket into player support but I highly doubt they will revert the ban.

> [{quoted}](name=SirBlueWaffle,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=Mcl6wm67,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-12-24T06:27:38.272+0000)
>
> Assuming Riot's rules on account sharing are similar to Valve's then you are responsible for the behaviour of others on your account. Also you can't get perma banned unless you go through 2 chat restrictions and a 2 week suspension so either your mates went through these over the last 3 months (which if they did, they  are massive %%%%s) or you were already on thin ice before you lent them the account. You can try sending a ticket into player support but I highly doubt they will revert the ban.

Yeah well thanks for your help. Im really annoyed i thought i could at least trust him not to get me banned like he actually quite a good mate and for him to do this.

Im not sure if this is were u go mate but again some of the things people say in this game is pretty intense compared to that i had people threatening to bomb my house before and although they are all talk its still scary to know people get that angry over a game. i hope u get unbanned with a warning or something man.
And Mate is this were i go if i want to ban appeal?. can u help me out
